message.content:
Top GitHub repos for LLM and agent builders (stars ≈ Sept 2025):
1. Significant-Gravitas/Auto-GPT — 160k⭐ — Autonomous task-driven agent framework.
2. langchain-ai/langchain — 70k⭐ — Modular orchestration toolkit for LLM chains and agents.
3. huggingface/transformers — 120k⭐ — Core model hub powering most downstream agent stacks.
4. ggerganov/llama.cpp — 60k⭐ — Portable inference runtime for Meta LLaMA models on CPUs/GPUs.
5. openai/openai-cookbook — 68k⭐ — Practical recipes for ChatGPT, Assistants, and tool-calling workflows.
6. microsoft/autogen — 24k⭐ — Multi-agent coordination framework with group chat abstractions.
7. lm-sys/FastChat — 35k⭐ — Open-source chat serving stack behind Vicuna and other instruct LLMs.
8. yoheinakajima/babyagi — 17k⭐ — Lightweight autonomous agent loop for experimental tasks.
9. mlc-ai/mlc-llm — 19k⭐ — Unified compiler/runtime for deploying LLMs on edge devices.
10. xtekky/gpt4free — 43k⭐ — Community-maintained adapters for public LLM endpoints (use responsibly).
